Uses of Class
org.jamwiki.authentication.WikiUserDetailsImpl

  • Packages that use WikiUserDetailsImpl 
    Package Description
    org.jamwiki.authentication
    Provides classes that implement and extend Spring Security functionality to provide support for authentication and access control in JAMWiki.
    org.jamwiki.servlets
    Provides classes that work with the Spring Framework to process HTTP requests and to then redirect appropriately.

    • Uses of WikiUserDetailsImpl in org.jamwiki.authentication

      Methods in org.jamwiki.authentication that return WikiUserDetailsImpl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WikiUserDetailsImpl WikiUserDetailsImpl.initWikiUserDetailsImpl(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      Utility method for converting a Spring Security Authentication object into a WikiUserDetailsImpl.

    • Uses of WikiUserDetailsImpl in org.jamwiki.servlets

      Methods in org.jamwiki.servlets that return WikiUserDetailsImpl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WikiUserDetailsImpl ServletUtil.currentUserDetails()
      Retrieve the current WikiUserDetailsImpl from Spring Security SecurityContextHolder.
      Methods in org.jamwiki.servlets with parameters of type WikiUserDetailsImpl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static boolean ServletUtil.isEditable(String virtualWiki, String topicName, WikiUserDetailsImpl user)
      Determine if a user has permission to edit a topic.
      protected static boolean ServletUtil.isMoveable(String virtualWiki, String topicName, WikiUserDetailsImpl user)
      Determine if a user has permission to move a topic.
